trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Newburgh
There were no other sightings in Newburgh on or around August 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching you tube videos when I stumbled upon this video of a man and his kids sending a home made weather balloon into space with a camera attached to it. To my amazement, at 4:10 into the video I heard a deep voice uttering words that I could not understand. After playing the video back over and over again I noticed that for a split second an apparition appears and disappears just before you hear the voice. Here is the tittle to that video. Space Balloon - Stratosphere Spacecraft Launched From Newburgh, NY
Summary: Some men and kids send a home made weather balloon into space and I heard a voice and saw an apparition appear in the video, I am the only one who noticed this so far.
